data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is a simple module to make using the excellent IPC::ShareLite
    module easier. I have already obtained permission from the author of
    IPC::ShareLite, Maurice Aubrey <maurice@redweek.com>, to publish
    this module on CPAN. The name Tie::ShareLite seemed like the obvious
    choice, and Maurice agreed.

    Thanks, Nathan Shafer
